imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic.CircleFitAlgebraic

Packages that use CircleFitAlgebraic
Package
Description
imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic
 

  • Uses of CircleFitAlgebraic in imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic

    Classes in imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic that implement CircleFitAlgebraic
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    CircleFit3Points
    Performs an exact circle fit to 3 given (non-collinear) points.
    class 
    CircleFitHyperSimple
    This is an implementation of the "hyperaccurate" algebraic circle fit proposed by Al-Sharadqah and Chernov in [1], also described in [2] (Sec. 7.5, Eq. 744).
    class 
    CircleFitHyperStable
    This is an implementation of the "hyperaccurate" algebraic circle fit proposed by Al-Sharadqah and Chernov in [1], also described in [2] (Sec. 7.5, Eq. 744).
    class 
    CircleFitKasaA
    This is an implementation of the algebraic circle fitting algorithm described in [1].
    class 
    CircleFitKasaB
    This is an implementation of the modified Kåsa [1] circle fitting algorithm described in [2, Sec. 5.1].
    class 
    CircleFitKasaC
    This is an improved implementation of the Kåsa [1] circle fitting algorithm described in [2, Sec. 5.2] (Eq. 5.12).
    class 
    CircleFitPratt
    This is an implementation of the algebraic circle fitting algorithm by Pratt [1], as described in [2] (Sec. 5.5-5.6).
    class 
    CircleFitTaubin
    This is an implementation of the algebraic circle fitting algorithm by Taubin [1], following the description in [2] (Sec. 5.9-5.10).
    Methods in imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic that return CircleFitAlgebraic
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static CircleFitAlgebraic
    CircleFitAlgebraic.getFit(CircleFitAlgebraic.FitType type, Pnt2d[] points)
    Creates and returns a new circle fit instance of the specified type for the given sample points.
